homePage.errorSelectFile: Please select a file and at least one language
homePage.errorApiKey: Please add your {provider} API key in Settings
homePage.errorInvalidJson: Invalid JSON file. Please select a valid JSON file.

about.title: About LocaleKit
about.description: LocaleKit is an AI-powered i18n translator that helps you translate JSON files into multiple languages using advanced AI models.
about.author: Tarik Kavaz

reloadConfirm.title: Reload and Clear Cache
reloadConfirm.message: This will clear the current file and restart the app. Continue?

quitConfirm.title: Quit Application
quitConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to quit LocaleKit? Any unsaved changes will be lost.

translationProgress.title: Translation Progress
translationProgress.warningsCount: {count} {count, plural, =1 {language has warning} other {languages have warnings}}
translationProgress.failedReselected: Failed languages have been reselected in the Language Selector. Review the errors above and retry with the current selection.
translationProgress.completedWithWarnings: Translation completed with these languages with warnings: {languages}.

appSettings.title: App Settings
appSettings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the app interface

languages.enterBoth: Please enter both code and name
languages.invalidCode: Invalid language code format. Use format: xx_xx (e.g., en_us)
languages.deleteMessage: Remove the language "{code}" from the list?

apiKeys.getKeyOpenai: Get your API key from OpenAI Platform
apiKeys.getKeyAnthropic: Get your API key from Anthropic Console
apiKeys.getKeyMistral: Get your API key from Mistral Console
apiKeys.getKeyOpenrouter: Free account + API key unlock free models (no credit card)
apiKeys.secureStorage: API keys are stored securely using OS-level secure storage and never leave your device.
apiKeys.failedSave: Failed to save API keys securely. Please try again.

usage.title: Usage Statistics
usage.description: Based on local history; costs are estimated from model pricing.
usage.estimatedNote: Estimated tokens are derived from character length; costs use model pricing where available.

errors.timeout: Timeout detected - file may be too large or API is slow
